    • golang题目(三)
    • golang实现http.server服务
package main

import (
    "fmt"; "log"; "net/http"
)

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Serving files in the current directory on port 8000")
    http.Handle("/", http.FileServer(http.Dir(".")))
    err := http.ListenAndServe(":8000", nil)
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatal("ListenAndServe: ", err)
    }
}
